TopicTitle: Launchpad is Shore Biome instead launchpad biome

Articles.Content:
[0.90, win7 64bit, KSP32bit) - The starting launchpad in career mode is now a shore biome, but strangely when i leave the launchpad (by foot in EVA) it changes to launchpad biome once i'm out outside the launchpad. Seems a bit wrong to me

Edited December 16, 2014 by thyriel
What reading gives you shores? EVA on the ladder? That's normal, I think, as there's no "flying over the launchpad" biome.

no not on the ladder, just by foot standing beneath the capsule is giving an EVA report on shores. When i enter the green fields around the launchpad i then get the launchpad EVA report

edit: just tried to reproduce it for some screenshots showing it and it's working now as it should. No idea if it was just some glitch or if i really missed that the report beneath the capsule was somehow considered "flying over".

Edited December 16, 2014 by thyriel
